1.2.name: wordpress/bigcontact
1.2.description:
Ever wanted a simple way of creating your contact page, with contact form and appointment calendar, maps, office hours, staff emails, scheduling calendar, and a sweet contact form. We created a simple solution that lets you configure your contact page in a way that was never possible before.

BigContact Contact Page makes it Possible for you to quickly and easily create sophisticated custom contact pages. You can use all or any combination of the page components to create your contact page. The elements on Big Contact Page can be placed in any position. You can choose to make just a contact form or make it an appointment form. Display business hours, contact emails, phone numbers, or may and directions on any page or section of the pages or posts on your site. Yes, the components of the contact page are globally available. You can display the BigContact Contact Page phone section in your blog posts or show the map and location on an event’s post.

BigContact Cont
